ServiceDetail.title: Vehicle Load Capacity Measurement
ServiceDetail.description: We offer vehicle load capacity measurement services with high accuracy and speed.

FAQDetail.title: How many types of trucks are currently available?
FAQDetail.description: There are currently three types of trucks, including light trucks, medium trucks, and heavy trucks.

FAQDetail.title: What tasks are suitable for light trucks?
FAQDetail.description: Light trucks are often used for transporting goods within the city, delivering to narrow areas, or for tasks involving lightweight cargo transportation.

FAQDetail.title: How durable are trucks?
FAQDetail.description: Trucks are designed to endure heavy loads and harsh operating conditions. However, regular maintenance and upkeep are crucial to ensure the durability and longevity of the vehicle.
